descriptor.doc:
The day of the week, e.g. used to specify to which day the opening hours of an OpeningHoursSpecification refer.
Commonly used values:
http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Monday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Tuesday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Wednesday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Thursday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Friday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Saturday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sunday http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#PublicHolidays
